Introduced Firebase Test lab to move UI automation test to the cloud.
Used Docker to ensure the availability of tools such as openssl for security testing HTTPS connections.
Performed secure code analysis of IGs Android apps.
Initial modularisation of the trading app code base to improve code reusability and reduce project build-times.
